name: Infinisource
overview: Infinisource, Inc. provides compliance and employees benefit administration services. The company provides administration and advisory services for Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act (COBRA), HIPAA Portability, state continuation, flexible spending accounts, health reimbursement arrangement, health savings accounts, and transportation reimbursement. It also offers HIPAA Solved, a HIPAA privacy and security solution; Infinisolved, an online eligibility and enrollment solution; Hrassist, a Web-based tool that provides information on benefits, compliance, and human resources issues; Payroll, a real-time Internet payroll processing solution; employee communication and benefit management; Infinisource custom administration; and unemployment management services. The companyâ€™s direct billing services include premium collection, documentation, tracking and reporting, and dispersion. In addition, it organizes education and Web seminars focusing on COBRA, HIPAA, Consumer Driven Health Care, Family and Medical Leave Act, and payroll. Infinisource was formerly known as COBRA Compliance Systems, Inc. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Coldwater, Michigan with additional offices in Indianapolis, Indiana and Dayton, Ohio.

funding_rounds.source_description: Infinisource Receives Majority Equity Investment from Accel-KKR

acquisitions.source_description: Infinisource Acquires Leading Human Capital Management Technology Firm Qqest
